-That was an accident. -[grunts] And you scared the animals.
translation.es: Fue sin querer. Y asustó a los animales. ¡Mire a Mary!¡Se hizo popó del miedo! Pídale perdón.

translation.en: Look at Mary! She's done a massive scared pony poo on the floor! Say sorry to her.
translation.es: Y asustó a los animales. ¡Mire a Mary!¡Se hizo popó del miedo! Pídale perdón.

translation.en: -Sorry, Mary. -In French.
-In? -French.
[groans] Pardon, Mary. Il très, uh, nincompoop.
So, you work here?
-Oui. -Do you know anything about plumbing?
-Wow, he's magic. -Now, this is just a temporary fix, okay?
translation.es: Hace magia. Esto es temporal, ¿sí?Tendré que revisar bien las tuberías.

translation.en: I have to take a proper look at your pipes.
translation.es: Esto es temporal, ¿sí?Tendré que revisar bien las tuberías.

translation.en: Okay, well, at least I can set up my workstation.
-Workstation? -[Matt] Yeah.
That's why I'm here, to work on a big pitch. -No distractions. -What about your farm work?
translation.es: - Vine a trabajar tranquilo.- ¿Y la granja?

translation.en: -Isn't that what you do? -I am not the farmer. I am the farmhand.
translation.es: - ¿No te ocupas tú de eso?- Pero no soy el granjero.

translation.en: The previous owner, your father, loved this place. -He was proper hands-on. -Was he?
translation.es: - Su padre adoraba trabajar aquí.- ¿De verdad?

translation.en: [Beano] He was a local hero.
He saved this place from the clutches of the bad people.
translation.es: Salvó este lugar de gente mala.

translation.en: They were gonna knock it down.
These bad people, did they offer any money or anything?
translation.es: ¿Esa gente mala ofreció dinero o algo?

translation.en: What? Proper cash-a-rooney.
Yeah, but he loved the animals and farm way too much to ever sell it.
translation.es: Pero amaba demasiado la granjapara venderla.

translation.en: -He sounds awesome. -He was awesome.
You have to admit this place is past its sell-by date. Nothing works. Even the hens don't work. Have you smelt the eggs? They stink!
translation.es: Esto está en ruinas. Nada funciona.Ni las gallinas. Los huevos apestan.

translation.en: Yes, 'cause no one's been here. We've been waiting for you,
translation.es: Porque no había nadie. Lo estábamos esperando,y ahora puede ayudar a salvar la granja.

translation.en: and now you are here, you can help us save the farm.
translation.es: Lo estábamos esperando,y ahora puede ayudar a salvar la granja.

translation.en: [Matt] Get off me! Can we save the farm, Daddy?
Yeah, Dad, can we save the farm with Beano?
No, staying here was just a temporary thing, and I'm gonna get on with some work.
translation.es: No, esto es algo temporal,y voy a seguir trabajando.

translation.en: We need to persuade your dad that this farm is way more important than his silly little pitch. Who's with me?
translation.es: Debemos convencerlo de que la granjaes más importante que su trabajo.

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
Okay. Walk this way.
Dad, you know Mummy would've wanted you to help us save the farm.
translation.es: Mami hubiera queridoque salvaras la granja.

translation.en: You saw how twinkly she was last night.
Okay, I tell you what, I will give you an hour tomorrow morning, and you can show me how this whole farm works.
translation.es: Mañana tendrán una horapara mostrarme cómo funciona la granja.

translation.en: Yes!
Well done, Mr. C.
[Beano] Hello!
Cock-a-doodle-doo! This is your 5 a.m. wake-up call.
Come on, sleepyhead.
-5 a.m.? It's the middle of the night. -Excuse me! Cows don't wait.
translation.es: - ¡Aún es de noche!- ¿Perdón? Las vacas no pueden esperar.Debe ordeñarlas y recoger popó.

translation.en: They've got to be milked, ready or not, and you've got to pick up their poop.
translation.es: Las vacas no pueden esperar.Debe ordeñarlas y recoger popó.

translation.en: Come on.
Why have I got to do this job? It's awful.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué debo hacer esto? Es horrible.- Su popó es oro.

translation.en: Cows' poop are like golden nuggets. Fertilizes the grass, helps it grow.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué debo hacer esto? Es horrible.- Su popó es oro. Fertiliza el pasto, lo hace crecer.Amamos la caca. La adoramos.

translation.en: We love the poop. We worship the poop.
translation.es: Fertiliza el pasto, lo hace crecer.Amamos la caca. La adoramos.

translation.en: How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
translation.es: Machaca mucha madera con mi hacha. Oiga, me recuerda a alguien.

translation.en: Hey, you remind me of someone. Have you seen the film The Shining?
translation.es: Oiga, me recuerda a alguien. ¿Vio la película El resplandor?¡Aquí está Beano!

translation.en: Here's Beano!
translation.es: ¿Vio la película El resplandor?¡Aquí está Beano!

translation.en: Let's chop some wood.
You need to put your back into it, Farmer Cunningham. Swing it really high.
Yeah? Try…
Whoa!
-Pretend I'm a big voluptuous pig. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Imaginen que soy un cerdo.- Sí.

translation.en: [Beano] Litter. Floor. Pig. Litter.
translation.es: Se come la basura del piso.

translation.en: Ooh! Lollipop!
Dangerous. Put your litter in the bin.
translation.es: Es peligroso. Tiren la basura al cesto.

translation.en: But most importantly, never ever leave that gate to the far field open,
translation.es: Y nunca olviden cerrarla tranquera que da a ese campo abierto,

translation.en: 'cause if that gate is left open, the animals will escape.
If they escape, they will get hurt, and if they get hurt, you will get hurt.
translation.es: Si escapan, se lastimarán,y ustedes saldrán lastimados.

translation.en: -Do you wanna meet the cows? -Yeah!
-Yes, you do! Come on. Let's go. -[Matt] Oh.
We've got Matilda, Patty, Harry, Hermione, Miss Trunchbull.
translation.es: Son Matilda, Patty, Harry,Hermione y Tronchatoro.

translation.en: A cow called Miss Trunchbull?
Oh, yes. Nanny McPhee and Susan Boyle.
translation.es: Sí. Nanny McPhee y Susan Boyle.

translation.en: -[cow moos] -How many sheep do you have?
Every time I count them, I fall to sleep, so I never get to the end.
translation.es: Me quedo dormido cuando las cuento.

translation.en: -What do you get paid for doing all this? -All this?
I get to live in the barn for free and eat all the produce that we grow,
translation.es: Vivo en el establo, como todo lo que cultivamosy me dan dinero para dulces.

translation.en: and I mean everything, and you give me money for sweets.
translation.es: como todo lo que cultivamosy me dan dinero para dulces.

translation.en: Obviously, you have to pay for other things, like the vet.
-The vet? -[Beano] The vet.
-Someone that looks after animals. -I know.
Why do you pay for a vet? It's a waste of money. They're like dentists. Always add a bit extra. A rip-off.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Es una pérdida de dinero.Como los dentistas, son ladrones.

translation.en: -Do you know him? Can you trust him? -I'm a "her" actually.
translation.es: - ¿Confías en él?- De hecho, soy mujer.

translation.en: And I don't rip anyone off.
translation.es: Y no le robo a nadie.

translation.en: -You're the horse lady. -And you're the road hog.
translation.es: - La del caballo.- El que maneja mal.

translation.en: -I won't be staying long, don't worry. -[vet] That's a shame.
translation.es: - Tranquila, ya me voy.- Qué pena.

translation.en: I baked these, but seeing as you're not staying…
translation.es: Hice esto, pero ya que no se quedará…

translation.en: Give 'em to me! Sorry, I just love Miss Ashley's cookies.
translation.es: ¡Démelas!Amo las galletas de la señorita Ashley.

translation.en: -Chocolate chip? -Triple chocolate chip.
Triple chocolate chip! Arnie! Look what Daddy's got for you.
translation.es: Triple chocolate.¡Arnie! Mira lo que tengo.

translation.en: I take it you're acquainted with all the animals here, then?
translation.es: Supongo que ya conocea todos los animales.

translation.en: [Matt] I mean, I'm not really an animal person.
translation.es: Sí. O sea, no son lo mío.

translation.en: Well, that's a shame. Mistletoe Farm has some wonderful livestock.
translation.es: Qué lástima.Esta granja tiene ganado maravilloso.

translation.en: -And you're about to get a new addition. -Huh?
-Holly's about to pop. -What?
She's pregnant.
You're kidding! [laughs]
You're kidding. No, 'cause a kid is a baby goat. It doesn't matter.
translation.es: Está como una cabra.¿Entiende? Cabra. No importa.

translation.en: You should prepare yourself because goats often have twins, sometimes triplets.
translation.es: Las cabras suelen tener mellizosy, a veces, trillizos.

translation.en: -Triplets? -[piglet squeals]
Oh, hello, Mr. Weenie! How are you today?
Hello, Ashley. Thank you for the cookies. I love you.
translation.es: Hola, Ashley. Gracias por las galletas.

translation.en: -Oh, it's okay! -Wee, wee, wee.
-It's a present! -Okay. That's… weird.
translation.es: - ¡De nada! ¡Es un regalo!- Te amo. ¡Bueno! Eso es raro.

translation.en: Listen, it was nice to meet you for a second time.
translation.es: Escuche, fue un placer.Ojalá no deba volver a verla.

translation.en: Hopefully I don't have to see you again. Oh, no. I just mean the animals are fine.
translation.es: Escuche, fue un placer.Ojalá no deba volver a verla. Significa que todos están bien.

translation.en: I come and check up on them every week.
And if Holly Goat's waters break, give me a call at the surgery.
translation.es: Y si la cabra Holly rompe bolsa,llámeme al consultorio.

translation.en: I think we've got it covered.
Yeah.
Ooh. I think there's something brewing, Weenie.
translation.es: Creo que hay algo ahí, Weenie.

translation.en: -Dad, who was that? -That was the vet.
She's really pretty.
She's really expensive is what she is, Rosie, and apparently we're having kids, maybe three.
translation.es: Es muy cara, Rosie,y parece que tendremos tres bebés.

translation.en: But you've just met. No, not me and Miss Ashley. The Holly jolly goat.
translation.es: - Pero se acaban de conocer.- Nosotros no, la cabra.

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham, I've give Weenie too many cookies.
translation.es: Le di demasiadas galletas a Weenie.

translation.en: There's poop everywhere. Take her. I need to clean it.
translation.es: Hay popó por todos lados. Debo limpiar.

translation.en: But I can't… Uh…
-Beano! Beano! -[kids laugh]
Oh, I'm glad you're back.
We've got a cat, two budgies, a parakeet, a ferret, a rabbit, and Oscar the pig.
translation.es: Tenemos un gato, tres pájaros,un hurón, un conejo y al cerdo Oscar.

translation.en: Seems to have eaten something that he shouldn't have again.
translation.es: Comió algo que no debía otra vez.

translation.en: -So, how did it go over at Mistletoe? -I met the new owner, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.es: ¿Cómo te fue en la granja? Conocí al nuevo dueño.

translation.en: -Ooh, what's he like? -To be honest, he's a bit…
-Couldn't put it better myself. -[woman laughs]
What's Oscar been up to this time?
He's eaten my dad's underpants again.
-[Beano] Mr. Cunningham! -Oh God!
-You nearly gave me a heart attack! -Sorry.
translation.es: - ¡Sr. Cunningham!- ¡Dios! ¡Qué susto! Perdón. Hicimos una lista de tareasy quedó a cargo de la Navidad.

translation.en: Me and the kids have come up with a roster of farm chores, and we put you in charge of Christmas!
translation.es: Perdón. Hicimos una lista de tareasy quedó a cargo de la Navidad.

translation.en: Yep. You've got to fix the barn up for the Hoedown Snowdown!
translation.es: ¡Preparará el establo para la fiesta! - ¿Qué?- Se hace todos los años.

translation.en: -The what? -Happens every Christmas at the barn.
We snow the place down. There's mulled wine and barn dancing, cowboy.
translation.es: Lo llenamos de nieve.Hay vino y baile, vaquero.

translation.en: Wait, no. It will not be happening this year. I need to do a pitch on Christmas Eve, and I need quiet.
translation.es: Este año, no. Debo trabajaren Nochebuena y necesito silencio.

translation.en: No, this will not do.
You have got to find a way to get Christmas into this barn. Your father would be very disappointed.
translation.es: Tiene que llevar la Navidad al establo.Su padre estaría decepcionado.

translation.en: Listen, you can have your Snowdown Hoedown if you like,
translation.es: Escucha,pueden hacer la fiesta si quieren,

translation.en: but you're not gonna have it on my farm.
Oh, boy, does your dad get angry. I don't think he likes Christmas anymore.
translation.es: - Su papá se enojó.- Creo que no le gusta la Navidad.

translation.en: He even made me leave the Christmas tree at home. We need help, guys, and I know exactly who we need.
translation.es: - Me hizo dejar el árbol en casa.- Necesitamos ayuda, chicos.

translation.en: We need to get your dad into the village to meet the village people.
translation.es: Su papá debe conocera la gente del pueblo.

translation.en: -Yes! -Ooh.
This, guys, is Cobbledon.
Post Office. Letters to Santa go there, okay, guys?
translation.es: El correo.Las cartas para Santa van allí, ¿sí?

translation.en: And now I'm gonna take ya to the Cobbledon Arms.
translation.es: Y los llevaré a Cobbledon Arms.

translation.en: Come on, we're clearly not welcome here.
-What's all this? -It's for you!
Beano told us you've come to save Mistletoe Farm.
translation.es: Beano nos dijo que salvará la granja.

translation.en: You're our hero!
Come in, come in, let's meet everyone.
This is Perky, the landlord.
Pleasure to meet you, son of Cunningham. Hey, first one's on me.
translation.es: - Un placer. Yo invito.- Ted, el carnicero. Barry, el panadero.

translation.en: This is Ted the butcher, Barry the baker, and Merrick.
translation.es: - Un placer. Yo invito.- Ted, el carnicero. Barry, el panadero. - Merrick.- El candelero.

translation.en: Let me guess, the candlestick maker?
-How'd you know? -I was joking.
He does! He makes candles.
I'm Otto, the builder. Anything you need fixing, I'm your man.
translation.es: Soy Otto, el constructor.Dígame si debo arreglar algo.

translation.en: And I'm Barney, the postman. I delivered the inheritance. Told you you'd like it.
translation.es: Y yo soy Barney, el cartero.Le dije que les gustaría la herencia.

translation.en: -And I'm the town crier! -Hello.
If you pop your head round here, you'll see Happy, Sneezy, Dopey, and this bundle of joy, Grumpy.
translation.es: Feliz, Estornudo, Tontíny la alegría personificada, Gruñón.

translation.en: It's what they played in panto last year. They were typecast.
My name's Gerald Favor. I'm the director of the Cobbledon Players. Did I ever tell you all about that time I did The Mousetrap?
translation.es: Soy Gerald, director del grupo de teatro.¿Les hablé de cuando hice La ratonera?

translation.en: [all] Yes!
And one of my favorites, Miss Bow. Only because I own the sweet shop.
translation.es: - Y una de mis favoritas, la Sra. Bow.- Porque vendo dulces.

translation.en: Who are these little mites?
We have Master Buster, Miss Violet, Miss Rosie, and the twins.
translation.es: Son Buster, Violet, Rosie y los mellizos.

translation.en: They don't look like twins. -[both] They're non-identical. -Ah.
translation.es: - No se parecen.- No son gemelos.

translation.en: -They're mine. -Where's your mummy?
She died.
-Oh… -Uh, here, have some sweets.
And I knitted you some novelties. Perhaps you'd like to choose one each.
translation.es: Y les tejí algunos juguetitos.Elijan uno cada uno.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
Hi, I'm Miss Nerris. Cobbledon Village School. Are these the children joining my class?
translation.es: Soy la señorita Nerris, la maestra.¿Estarán en mi clase?

translation.en: I'm excited about getting them to hang out with children their age.
translation.es: Sí. Quiero que estén con niños de su edad.

translation.en: There's only two children in my class. There's only two children in the whole school, actually.
translation.es: Solo hay dos niños en mi clase.Y en toda la escuela.

translation.en: You see, we're a very small village with a teeny tiny population.
translation.es: Somos un pueblo de muy pocos habitantes.

translation.en: Forty-seven. Twenty-nine letterboxes.
Fine, as long as they do educational activities. Of course. -If I can think of any. -[laughter]
translation.es: - Mientras hagan actividades…- Sí. Si se me ocurre alguna.

translation.en: What I mean is education comes in many forms.
Does it?
-Yeah. -That is true.
Do you like singing?
-Do you? -You're welcome to join the choir.
Hi, I'm Abel. I organize the welly throwing.
I'm Aaron, head bell ringer. We practice on a Monday if you're free.
I'm Miss Verity. I run the village bookshop and library. Pop in any time for a book and a biscuit.
translation.es: Soy la Srta. Verity.Los espero en la librería y biblioteca.

translation.en: By the way, my name's Miss Womble,
and I've created the knitting circle,
and I knit all the jumpers that you can see here, every single one of them, and the hats,
translation.es: y tejí todos los suéteres que ven aquí,cada uno de ellos, y los gorros.

translation.en: and we'd be delighted if you'd like to all join in,
and we'd especially like you to join, Mr. Cunningham.
If you don't know how to knit, we could knit you a jumper. We could knit your face onto it if you like.
translation.es: Si no sabe tejer, podemos tejerle algo.Un suéter con su cara si quiere.

translation.en: What do you think?
-He's handsome, isn't he? -Yes.
Listen, I'm not really into all this community stuff.
translation.es: Miren, todo esto no es lo mío.

translation.en: We were gonna ask you to be the president of the Christmas Association.
translation.es: Queremos que dirijala Asociación de Navidad.

translation.en: Your father always cut down the biggest Christmas tree and donated it to the village square.
translation.es: Su padre siempre talaba un árboly lo ponía en la plaza.

translation.en: We don't have a Christmas tree at the house.
-Not even any Christmas lights. -No Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
translation.es: Ni siquiera luces. ¿No hay Navidad en la granja?

translation.en: Well, we'll have to see what we can do about that, won't we?
translation.es: Tendremos que hacer algo al respecto, ¿no?

translation.en: Absolutely.
Uh, who fancies a Cobbledon Soda? Yeah. You take a seat. Come on.
translation.es: ¿Quién quiere un refresco? Sí. Siéntense. Vamos.

translation.en: -[Matt exhales] -How's Holly Goat?
Um, I haven't checked on her. I don't know. You haven't checked on your pregnant goat?
translation.es: - No fui a verla todavía. No sé.- ¿No fue a ver a su cabra preñada?

translation.en: Well… No, I'm sure she'll be fine. -I'll check when I get back. -[whimsical music plays]
translation.es: Bueno… Seguro está bien.Iré a verla cuando regrese.

translation.en: 5,000, and he hasn't paid… Have you paid for anything?
translation.es: Cinco mil, y no ha pagado. ¿Pagaste algo?

translation.en: Sweets. Sweets? £68 on sweets.
It can't be.
Is it saying "Matt"?
-Hey, Holly. How you doing? -[Holly bleats]
Are you a bit anxious? My wife was scared when she had our first baby.
translation.es: ¿Ansiosa? Mi esposaestaba asustada con el primer bebé.

translation.en: I mean, not as scared as me. I was terrified about being a dad.
translation.es: No tan asustada como yo.Me aterraba ser papá.

translation.en: Didn't know if I'd be any good. Nice to see you talking to the animals, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.es: - No sabía si sería un buen padre.- Me alegra que le hable.

translation.en: You know, they understand everything we say,
and we can understand every bleat, moo, bark, oink, if we truly listen.
translation.es: y podemos entender cada sonidosi prestamos atención.

translation.en: Well, I have listened, understood, and now I'm leaving.
translation.es: Ya escuché, ya entendí y ahora me voy.

translation.en: Mr. C, when you were talking to Holly about not being a good enough dad…
translation.es: Señor C., dijo que no sabíasi sería un buen padre.

translation.en: -I think you're going to be a great dad. -"Going to be"?
Me and your popsicle, we were close. He let me call him grandpops because he knew he missed out on his own kid and grandkids.
translation.es: Su papi me dejaba llamarlo abueporque se había quedado sin hijo y nietos.

translation.en: I don't want you missing out too. I am nothing like my "popsicle," okay?
translation.es: - No quiero que le pase lo mismo.- No soy como él, ¿bien?

translation.en: I don't think you should be sticking your nose into my family.
translation.es: Y no deberías meterte en mi familia.

translation.en: We're family too! How?
If your popsicle was my grandpops, then you are more or less my dad.
translation.es: Si su papi era mi abue,usted es como mi papá.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
You're a fully grown man, and you are definitely not my family.
translation.es: Eres un adultoy no eres parte de mi familia.

translation.en: -Did you put that step there? -No.
-Night, Dad. -[sad music plays]
You literally took the words right out of my mouth.
translation.es: Me sacaste las palabras de la boca.

translation.en: Hey, Buster, what's up?
-I had a bad dream. -Oh, buddy, come here.
You know bad dreams aren't real.
Do we have to go to school tomorrow?
School is meant to be fun.
But the children might laugh at me.
translation.es: Los niños podrían reírse de mí.

translation.en: -Why would anybody laugh at you? -Because I wear sparkly things.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué?- Porque uso cosas con brillos.

translation.en: You know, Buster, there's absolutely nothing wrong with wearing sparkly things. Anyone can wear sparkles.
translation.es: Buster, eso no tiene nada de malo.Cualquiera puede usar brillos.

translation.en: Even Fleece?
Definitely Fleece. Even Mary and Bright?
Yes, ponies love sparkles. Even you?
translation.es: - Sí, los ponis aman los brillos.- ¿Y tú?

translation.en: Well, I'm not exactly a sparkly kind of person,
translation.es: Bueno, a mí no me gustan mucho,

translation.en: but your mum, she used to love anything with glitter and sequins.
translation.es: pero tu mamáamaba la brillantina y las lentejuelas.

translation.en: Did she wear a princess crown?
I bet she did when she was your age.
-Shall we go to bed? -Yeah.
Come on, then.
Mary and Bright fed and exercised?
-Check! -Check.
-Cows and goats milked? -[both] Check.
Pigs and piglets cleaned?
-Double check. -Double check-a-rooney.
Next job, school. We don't wanna go to school.
translation.es: - Ahora, a la escuela.- No queremos ir a la escuela.

translation.en: -We wanna stay on the farm with you. -I don't think your dad would like that.
translation.es: - Queremos quedarnos.- Su papá se enojará.

translation.en: -How are we gonna get to school anyway? -Yeah, Dad always gives us a lift.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo iremos?- Sí, papá siempre nos lleva.

translation.en: Ta-da.
-[Buster] What are they? -Bicycles.
-[Buster] I don't know how to ride. -You don't know how to ride a bike?
translation.es: - No sé andar.- ¿No saben andar en bicicleta?

translation.en: Well, then, you're gonna have to learn. First bikes, then tractors.
translation.es: Tendrán que aprender.Primero, bicis, luego tractores.

translation.en: Get your right leg, put it over the bike.
translation.es: Pasen la pierna derechasobre la bicicleta.

translation.en: Look forward, okay? No wobbling. These are your brakes.
translation.es: Derechos. No se tambaleen.Estos son los frenos.

translation.en: Okay, guys? Very straight. Focus. Let's go.
Second one, go.
Let's go, go, go! Yes, buddy.
translation.es: Vamos. ¡Vamos! Sí, amigo.Pies en los pedales. ¡Sí!

translation.en: Feet on the pedals. Yes! You've got it!
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Sí, amigo.Pies en los pedales. ¡Sí! ¡Eso es!

translation.en: Yes!
-Have you seen the kids? -They've gone to school.
-What? How? -On their bikes. Like I did.
You went to school? Yeah. I went to farm school.
-Is that even a thing? -Uh, yes.
Are you sure they're gonna be okay just biking off?
translation.es: ¿Van a estar bien? No conocen la zona.

translation.en: -They don't know the area. -They'll be fine.
translation.es: ¿Van a estar bien? No conocen la zona. Estarán bien.

translation.en: -Where's the school? -In the village.
-Where's the village? -I don't know.
-[Buster] We're lost. -[Violet] It's okay, Buster.
[Charlie] I'm getting the wobbles again!
Dad says to always stay where we are until someone finds us.
There's no one here though. Yes, there is. Look!
[all] Yoo-hoo! Hello!
Hello, young 'uns.
We're late for school. The school's only up the road. Come on.
translation.es: - Vamos a la escuela.- Está en esta calle. Vengan.

translation.en: Is there really no Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
Nope, no Christmas.
We're gonna have to help your father bring back Christmas traditions.
[Perky] And this is your new school.
translation.es: Y esta es su nueva escuela.

translation.en: There you are, children! Don't worry, I've only just got here. Kayla and Kayan are dying to meet you.
translation.es: ¡Ahí están! Tranquilos, recién llego.Kayla y Kayan mueren por conocerlos.

translation.en: Pop your bikes on the floor. Thank you so much.
-In you go. -Break a leg!
Right, come on then. In you go. Sit down at the table.
translation.es: Bien, vamos. Pasen. Siéntense en la mesa.

translation.en: Right, then.
So now we have a big, huge class, we can do so many things.
translation.es: Ahora tenemos un grupo grande.Podemos hacer muchas cosas.

translation.en: We can… make a school choir or put on a big Christmas play.
translation.es: Podemos hacer un coro escolaro una obra navideña.

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
What else do you wanna do?
-We don't really like school. -Especially our old school.
translation.es: - No nos gusta la escuela.- Especialmente la anterior.

translation.en: Why not?
I had a lot of friends, but when Mum died, I got sad, and they called me boring.
translation.es: Cuando mamá murió,me puse triste, y decían que era aburrida.

translation.en: -Oh gosh, that's terrible, isn't it? -[Kayla and Kayan] Yeah.
translation.es: Vaya. Eso es terrible, ¿no? - Sí.- ¿Y tú, Violet?

translation.en: -What about you, Violet? -I get scared.
translation.es: - Sí.- ¿Y tú, Violet? Me da miedo. No por nada en particular.A veces me siento mal.

translation.en: Not about anything special. I just get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.es: Me da miedo. No por nada en particular.A veces me siento mal.

translation.en: That's all right. We all get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.es: Está bien. A todos nos pasa.

translation.en: Kids used to laugh at me because I wear sparkles. We love sparkles here, don't we?
translation.es: - Se reían de mí porque uso brillos.- Nos encantan, ¿no?

translation.en: -Yeah, they're pretty. -And they're cool.
How about we decorate the school Christmas tree?
translation.es: ¿Y si decoramos el árbol de Navidad?

translation.en: -Yes! -[Miss Nerris] Make it sparkly.
Come on, then. Follow me.
That's it. Pop your decorations on.
-Where'd you get that star, Violet? -I made it for my mum at nursery.
translation.es: - ¿Y esa estrella?- La hice para mi mamá.

translation.en: We put it on the tree every year, but there's not a tree at the farmhouse.
translation.es: La pongo todos los años,pero no tenemos árbol.

translation.en: Well, Miss Nerris, maybe we can lend them our tree this year. We don't mind.
translation.es: Podemos prestarles nuestro árbol.No nos molesta.

translation.en: I don't think your dad would like it. I think our dad would be so busy working, he wouldn't even notice.
translation.es: - No creo que su papá quiera.- Está tan ocupado que ni lo notará.

translation.en: Really? Well, that's perfect.
We'll take the tree to the farmhouse, and he won't even know we've been.
translation.es: Llevaremos el árbol a la granja.

translation.en: Global? Global, global. Global.
-Marketing. Advantages. -[knocking on door]
Merry Crimble!
Festive gifts and Womble's knits!
-It's Christmas! -Ho-ho-ho!
-Sorry, what? -Where would you like us to start?
-[Matt] Start? -We've got to start on the decorations.
-Okay. -No, we'll dress the set. -Come on, Dame Judi. -See you later.
translation.es: - Decoraremos todo. Ven, Judi.- Hasta luego.

translation.en: Oh, Merry Christmas, Mr. Cunningham!
Okay, listen, everyone. Sorry, can I get your attention?
I really do appreciate the community spirit. I do, okay? But is there not a time that is more convenient?
translation.es: Aprecio el espíritu comunitario,pero ¿pueden volver en otro momento?

translation.en: Christmas won't wait for convenience. The Hoedown Snowdown will not stage itself.
translation.es: La Navidad no puede esperar.La fiesta no se organizará sola.

translation.en: We are not having the Hoedown Snowdown this year. Not here, not now.
translation.es: No haremos la fiesta este año.No aquí, no ahora.

translation.en: Okay? So if everyone can just…
Thank you so much. It's great, but if you can…
That's it, take your hammer. Off you go. Very good. Thank you.
All the best. Thank you.
They're only trying to bring Christmas spirit.
I don't need Christmas spirit. I need peace and quiet.
translation.es: No necesito eso.Necesito paz y tranquilidad.

translation.en: No. No. Out! Fine, no. Tell you what. Stay. Make yourself a sandwich.
translation.es: No. ¡Fuera! Bueno, no.Quédate. Prepárate un sándwich.

translation.en: Make yourself at home. -Get out of my way. -[donkey brays]
Don't worry, donkey number two. He's just a silly old Grinch.
translation.es: Tranquilo, número dos. Solo es un grinch.

translation.en: [laughs] I know. -Who wears a tie at a farm? -[knocking]
Ho-ho-ho. I've got a delivery for you.
-What delivery? -Christmas cards from the villagers.
A lovely one from Miss Womble. Hand-knitted, impressive. Two lines of poetry in it.
translation.es: Una tejida de la señora Womble.Dos líneas de poesía.

translation.en: -Sorry, are you reading my post? -Only for health and safety.
Shall I take yours to the sorting office now?
It's Womble, L-E. Not E-L.
You might wanna put a kiss on each card. We usually do, just to be friendly.
I'm not putting a kiss.
And talking of Christmas cards, your father used to be so popular, he had hundreds of cards up here round on the walls.
translation.es: Hablando de tarjetas, su papá era popular.Tenía cientos de tarjetas en la pared.

translation.en: And generous!
He used to put a £10 note in each card with a little note saying, "Have a Cobbledon Brew on me."
translation.es: Ponía 10 libras en cada tarjeta"para una cerveza Cobbledon".

translation.en: Did he? Good for him. Right. That's the last one.
translation.es: Bien por él. Es la última.

translation.en: And you need to go.
I have a very important virtual meeting with a friend of mine starting very soon.
translation.es: Tengo una reunión virtual importantecon un amigo pronto.

translation.en: [Barney] All right.
We have real friends round here, Mr. Cunningham, not virtual ones.
translation.es: Aquí tenemos amigos de verdad,no virtuales, señor Cunningham.

translation.en: Virtual friends, I don't know!
Ah, Miss Nerris, seeing as I'm passing, I'll just give you one of those.
-Lovely. Thank you. -From…
What's this? We brought it from the school!
-Miss Nerris said we could! -Can we show Kayla and Kayan the animals?
-Haven't they got to get back to school? -No. Children love animals.
Like I said, Mr. Cunningham, education takes many forms.
translation.es: Como dije, hay muchas formas de educar.

translation.en: [Beano] Mr. C! Mr. C!
Farmer Cunningham, it's Holly Goat. Her waters have broken!
-What? -[Beano] Quick!
Okay, listen, I need you to call Miss Ashley, okay?
And… Oh, get a discount.
I'm coming!
Hang on!
Miss Ashley's on her way. Do you mind if me and the kids stay and watch?
-This would be very educational. -Please can we see the baby goat get born?
Stay up there, okay? Stay out the way because this is grown-up stuff.
translation.es: Quédense ahí, ¿sí?Esto es cosa de adultos.

translation.en: Blow out, blow in, blow out, blow in.
You don't blow out, blow in. You breathe in, you breathe out.
translation.es: No es así. Uno inhala y exhala.

translation.en: Breathe in, breathe out. Breathe in, breathe out. I can't breathe. I'm having a panic attack.
translation.es: Inhala y exhala. No puedo respirar.Estoy teniendo un ataque de pánico.

translation.en: You're hyperventilating. You need to calm down.
No! Please! Come on, sheepy-sheep.
-That's it. I do have somewhere to go. -[bleating]
-Yes! -That's… Oh, God! There's a head!
There's a head in a bubble. I can't… I'm gonna…
translation.es: En una burbuja. No puedo. Voy a…

translation.en: No, no. You are not gonna pass out!
This is just Mother Nature taking its course.
Look, I'll just take a… Oh my God. Yeah, that is a bit weird. I'm dizzy!
translation.es: Mire… Dios.Sí, es un poco raro. ¡Me mareé!

translation.en: Let me help.
Sh, it's all right. It's all right. You're doing really well. Keep pushing.
translation.es: Cálmate. Lo estás haciendo muy bien.Sigue pujando.

translation.en: Harder! Keep pushing! Harder! You're doing great! Harder! Keep pushing.
translation.es: ¡Más fuerte! ¡Sigue pujando! Lo estás haciendo genial.

translation.en: -Violet, you totally smashed it! -Look at what you did!
Look what you did.
I got here as fast as I could. How's everything going?
translation.es: - Vine tan rápido como pude. ¿Qué tal?- Se perdió todo.

translation.en: -Well, you missed the whole thing. -I wouldn't be so sure.
translation.es: - Vine tan rápido como pude. ¿Qué tal?- Se perdió todo. No lo creo.

translation.en: -She's right. I can see another bubble. -Beano, listen. I don't feel…
translation.es: - Tiene razón. Veo otra burbuja.- Beano, no me…

translation.en: What are you doing? This is no time to sleep.
translation.es: ¿Qué hace? No es hora de dormir.

translation.en: Violet will help you. She delivered the first one.
-Well done, Violet. -[Violet] Come on, Holly.
[Miss Ashley] Ah! I'll just, uh, wrap her up in a towel.
translation.es: - La envolveré en una toalla.- Sí.

translation.en: So cute.
-Ooh. Oh! Looks like she's pushing again. -[phone rings]
No, now is not a good time. I can't talk.
Fletcher wants an update now! I tried covering for you, but she wants to speak to you.
translation.es: Intenté cubrirte,pero Fletcher quiere hablar contigo.

translation.en: -Tell her I'm indisposed. -I tried, but she's insisting!
Looks like a breech. I can find the feet. I need you to pull.
translation.es: Está al revés. Siento los pies. Tire.

translation.en: -What are you doing, anyway? -I'm trying to deliver a kid.
-What? -Oh God, Miss Fletcher's calling me.
Cunningham! Is that you? Hi! Miss Fletcher.
It has come to my understanding that you're in some kind of creative retreat
translation.es: Escuché que está en una especie de retiropara no tener distracciones,

translation.en: so as to have no distractions, as it were. Is that right?
translation.es: Escuché que está en una especie de retiropara no tener distracciones, ¿es cierto?

translation.en: That's right!
-That's it! Push! I need you to pull. -[grunts]
-Is that a woman's voice I can hear? -No, it's just a kid.
translation.es: - ¿Esa es una mujer?- No, es un bebé.

translation.en: Come on, Holly. Push.
Children and business do not mix!
translation.es: ¡Los niños y los negocios no se mezclan!

translation.en: Sorry, Miss Fletcher, you're breaking up. I have to go.
translation.es: Perdón, se está cortando. Debo irme.

translation.en: Come on, Holly! Push! I need you to push. Pull.
-That's it. -[Matt grunts, sighs]
-We did it! -[Miss Ashley] We did it!
Sorry. I didn't… It's just…
-Yeah. -We made a baby!
We made a baby!
Ooh, big daddy!
[chuckles] Look how many babies you've gone and done.
Who's a good daddy? You're a good daddy. Who's a good daddy?
-[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] No, she's not taking.
I'm afraid you're going to have to hand-rear them. Take them in for a while.
translation.es: Deberá alimentarlosy cuidarlos por un tiempo.

translation.en: Miss Holly's exhausted.
Don't worry, they'll be okay.
If you can bottle-feed them, take them to bed, cuddle them,
keep them warm, sing to them, things you did with your own children.
translation.es: abríguelos y cánteles,como hizo con sus hijos.

translation.en: I didn't really do the nursing stuff.
translation.es: Yo no hice todas esas cosas.

translation.en: Well, now's your chance.
-[goat bleats] -Okay.
So you did really well, Miss Violet. Would you like to come and help me at the surgery?
translation.es: Gran trabajo, señorita Violet.¿Quieres ayudarme en el consultorio?

translation.en: -[gasps] Yes, please. Can I, Dad? -I don't see why not.
translation.es: - Sí. ¿Puedo, papá?- No veo por qué no.

translation.en: I know he wants them to be in school, but seeing little Violet there in action
translation.es: Sé que quiere que vayan a la escuela,

translation.en: makes me think farm school would be better for their confidence.
translation.es: pero la granja escuelasería mejor para ellos.

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Miss Nerris. That's what I've been trying to tell people.
translation.es: Gracias. Es lo que intentaba decirles.

translation.en: Farm school is amazing, and Farmer Cunningham needs it more than anyone.
translation.es: La granja escuela es genial.Cunningham debería ir.

translation.en: And the kids, too, especially Kayla and Kayan. They've been on their own up until now.
translation.es: Y los niños, sobre todo Kayla y Kayan.Estuvieron solos hasta ahora.

translation.en: Don't worry, Miss Nerris. Beano's got a plan.
translation.es: No se preocupe, Srta. Nerris.Beano tiene un plan.

translation.en: We've got three baby Christmas goats.
So what about… Snowy?
-Yeah. -Yeah? Star.
-Yeah! -Do you want to name the third?
-Yes. -[Beano] Go on, then!
We want to name it after our mummy.
This little dude's a boy.
We don't mind. We want to call it Sarah.
Welcome, Sarah,
to the family.
-Hello? -[Mo] Yo, she's after your address.
-She wants to know where the farm is! -What?
[Mo] Fletcher! She said she was disappointed with your FaceTime call, said you were distracted by your kids!
translation.es: ¡Fletcher! Dijo que estaba decepcionada,que tus hijos te distraen.

translation.en: Well, to be honest, it wasn't my kids. It was Holly's.
translation.es: No son ellos, son los de Holly.

translation.en: [Mo] You were supposed to go to that farm to work, to save our jobs.
translation.es: Te fuiste a trabajar ahí para salvarnos.

translation.en: The Banda House vultures are circling this deal, bro!
-[knocking on door] -Somebody at the door.
Hi, Mr. Cunningham.
Just thought that it'd be really nice if the children could spend time with the baby goats?
translation.es: Sería lindo que los niñospasen tiempo con las cabras.

translation.en: -[bleating] -Uh, what, today?
Me and the villagers thought it'd be really great if everyone could take part in their education,
translation.es: Pensamos que sería genialsi todos participaran en su educación,

translation.en: and today is your turn.
I've already got five children, three kids. You want to give me two more?
translation.es: Tengo cinco hijos y tres cabras.¿Quiere darme más?

translation.en: "It'd be so good for them to have children their own age to play with."
translation.es: "Quiero que estén con niños de su edad".

translation.en: -Isn't that what you said? -Yes. But I didn't mean--
Okay, off you pop. Have fun!
-Enjoy farm school! -Right, who wants to dig up some sprouts?
translation.es: - Bien, vayan. ¡Diviértanse!- Adiós. ¿Quién quiere recoger coles? Sí. ¡Síganme!

translation.en: Yes, come on. Follow me!
Last one to the top of the hill has to peel them too! You too, Mr. Cunningham!
Come on, Rudolph!
Come on, boy.
-What's going on? -We're having sprouts for lunch.
[laughs] Good luck getting my kids to have sprou-- [Buster] Mm.
translation.es: Buena suerte, mis hijos no com…

translation.en: Buster, where's your lollipop?
I gave it to Billy Goat. I like sprouts now.
translation.es: Se la di a Billy. Me gusta la col.

translation.en: -Do you want a sprout? -No. Absolutely not.
You can't hide in your study forever!
So we need to find a way to draw him out of that boring little study.
translation.es: Debemos sacarlo de ese aburrido estudio.

translation.en: -Any ideas? -Why don't you show Dad your tractor?
Oh yeah! Even Daddy likes tractors. Yes. Yes, I love it.
translation.es: - Hasta a él le gustan los tractores.- Sí, genial.

translation.en: It's big. It's bold. It's beautiful!
translation.es: Es un gran plan. Audaz. Hermoso.

translation.en: Come on, follow me.
Let's go!
-Ready? Let's go! Woo-hoo! -[exciting music plays]
Innovation that we can bring to your products and your businesses.
-We go the extra mile. -[bleep] -Why is it doing that? The-- -[beeping] What's that?
translation.es: Buscamos superar las expectativas.¿Qué pasa? ¿Qué es eso?

translation.en: It's crashed. Oh my God. Yeah, I know. It's worse than that. Okay.
translation.es: No funciona. Dios. Sí, lo sé. Es aún peor.

translation.en: What else did I write? I wrote "connections."
Oh, this is a nightmare!
What's that growing on the tree, Beano?
Oh, this?
This is mistletoe. It grows all over the farm.
translation.es: ¿Esto? Esto es muérdago. Crece por toda la granja.Por eso se llama así.

translation.en: That's where Mistletoe Farm gets its name. But our mistletoe is magic.
translation.es: Crece por toda la granja.Por eso se llama así. - Nuestro muérdago es mágico.- ¿A qué te refieres?

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.es: - Nuestro muérdago es mágico.- ¿A qué te refieres?

translation.en: Our mistletoe doesn't make people just kiss.
translation.es: No solo hace que la gente se bese.

translation.en: It makes them fall in love.
Come on! I'll show ya.
Donkey number one, donkey number two, I've seen the way you look at each other.
translation.es: Número uno, número dos,he visto cómo se miran.

translation.en: Now it's time to bring some magic to your romance.
translation.es: Es hora de darle magia a su romance.

translation.en: Yes!
[chuckles] Love is in the air!
That's what I'm saying. It's an absolute nightmare.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Eso digo. Mi computadora se rompió.Me dejó cuentas sin pagar.

translation.en: My computer's crashed. He's left me all these unpaid bills.
translation.es: Mi computadora se rompió.Me dejó cuentas sin pagar.

translation.en: -Hay bills, electricity, gas, water! -I knew this would happen.
translation.es: ¡Heno, electricidad, gas, agua! Lo sabía. Te metió en problemas.

translation.en: Your father's left you in trouble.
translation.es: Lo sabía. Te metió en problemas.

translation.en: I know that you said to manage my expectations. We're coming back to London straight away.
translation.es: Me dijiste que no me ilusionara.Volveremos a Londres.

translation.en: Sorry, Mum, can I call you back?
-Do you want to ride the tractor? -No! I've got tons of work to do!
-I don't wanna go back to London. -We have to do something.
translation.es: - No quiero volver.- Debemos hacer algo.

translation.en: Magic mistletoe. Voilà.
Merry Christmas to you.
-Merry Christmas. -How's it going?
translation.es: - Feliz Navidad.- Feliz Navidad. - ¿Qué tal?- Juntamos dinero para que no se vayan.

translation.en: We're trying to help with the bills so he doesn't take them back to London.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tal?- Juntamos dinero para que no se vayan.

translation.en: No way! You can't go back there! This is your home now.
translation.es: ¡No! No pueden irse. Este es su hogar.

translation.en: -What's going on? -Their dad wants to take 'em to London.
But you're the future of Cobbledon. All right, let me get one.
Hello, children. I've brought you each a ball of wool and some needles.
translation.es: Hola, niños. Les traje ovillos de lana y agujas.

translation.en: You can choose your color. Ooh! The mistletoe.
I haven't seen this for a while. I'm gonna have a whole basketful.
translation.es: Hacía tiempo que no veía.Quiero una canasta.

translation.en: -Oh! -[Miss Womble] Thank you.
-Never know when the magic will happen! -No!
translation.es: - No sabe cuándo sucederá la magia.- No.

translation.en: Hello, Otto.
Hey, you want some? It's for a good cause. Why would I want some? It's not like I want to kiss Miss Nerris.
translation.es: - ¿Quiere? Es por una buena causa.- No. No quiero besar a la Srta. Nerris.

translation.en: I've made a contribution. I'll keep it safe… until you're ready.
translation.es: - Hice una contribución.- Lo guardaré hasta que estés lista.

translation.en: I've been ready for years, Otto.
translation.es: Hace años que estoy lista, Otto.

translation.en: Beano, can I get some of that?
Thank you very much.
Hello, ladies! [chuckles]
Hello!
[gasps] How are the kids?
Mr. Cunningham's doing really well with them. He's even named one of them Sarah.
translation.es: El Sr. Cunningham las cuida.Le puso Sarah a una.

translation.en: I'll take one of those. You never know when you might need it.
translation.es: Llevaré uno. - Quizá lo necesite.- Sí.

translation.en: -[Beano] Yeah. -[whimsical music plays]
Bye.
It's gonna happen! It's gonna happen!
Sorry to disturb you.
I hear you're thinking about going back to the city.
translation.es: Oí que está pensando en irse.

translation.en: -Where'd you hear that? -The village vine.
-Can you take Snowy? -Sure.
-Come on. -I just need to go boil the kettle.
Get the hot water bottles ready. Come on.
Hey, guys.
I'm gonna keep you nice and warm.
-[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] Good girl.
How are you girls getting on?
-New owner treating you well? Huh? -[donkeys bray]
-[Matt] You're great with the animals. -Thank you. Just did Holly's milk.
translation.es: - Es genial con ellos.- Gracias. Leche de Holly.

translation.en: Thank you. It's easier with Holly's kids than my own.
translation.es: Gracias. Es más fácilcuidar a sus hijos que a los míos.

translation.en: Must be hard for them losing their mum. I don't really like to talk about it.
translation.es: - Perdieron a su mamá.- No quiero hablar de eso.

translation.en: Well, if you ever do want to talk about it, I'm good with humans too.
translation.es: Si alguna vez quiere,también soy buena con los humanos.

translation.en: -[cell phone rings] -Oh, yeah.
Emergency. It's, uh, Oscar the pig again.
translation.es: Emergencia. Es el cerdo Oscar otra vez.

translation.en: -Gotta go! -No, wait. You dropped something.
translation.es: - ¡Debo irme!- No. Se le cayó algo.

translation.en: Do you think she used the mistletoe?
Doesn't look like it. But if your dad and Miss Ashley did fall in love,
translation.es: - ¿Habrá usado el muérdago?- No parece. Pero si se enamora,querrá quedarse y salvar la granja.

translation.en: he would definitely want to stay and save the farm.
translation.es: Pero si se enamora,querrá quedarse y salvar la granja.

translation.en: -We need to make it happen. -[Charlie] What about Mum?
[Rosie] I think she wants that too.
We need to find a way to get Miss Ashley back here.
Why don't we ask her for dinner tomorrow?
And pretend that Rudolph's sick and needs help?
Won't she be mad if she finds out we're lying?
No, no. She won't find out.
Rudolph is a really good actor. He is well sick.
translation.es: Rodolfo es un muy buen actor. Es mortal.

translation.en: Right, for this smoochy magic to work, we're gonna need way more mistletoe, okay?
translation.es: Para que la magia funcione,necesitamos muérdago.

translation.en: Let's spread out all over the farm.
Operation Mistletoe, go, go, go! Let's go!
I have had no updates and no evidence to suggest he has done any work at all.
translation.es: No he tenido noticias ni pruebasque sugieran que haya hecho algo.

translation.en: If Fletcher Consultants is in trouble,
translation.es: Si Fletcher Consultores está en problemas,

translation.en: I need to see it with my own eyes.
translation.es: necesito verlo con mis propios ojos.

translation.en: No, she can't come here.
That's what she said! She's the boss! I think she thinks you're hiding.
translation.es: ¡Eso dijo! Cree que te estás escondiendo.

translation.en: Just stop her from coming, okay? I am so close to nailing this pitch.
translation.es: Evita que venga, ¿sí? Ya casi termino.

translation.en: You look worried. Why am I talking to a goat? I need to get out!
Brilliant job! Yes! Let's go, go, go!
-Peekaboo! -Hello there. [laughs awkwardly]
I understand you're having a bit of financial difficulty at the farm.
Now look, we've got a Christmas show coming up.
I would be more than happy to do a bucket collection. I really need a singer for the carol concert.
translation.es: - Podríamos recaudar dinero.- Necesito un cantante de villancicos.

translation.en: Maybe a little singsong will cheer you up. No, I don't sing.
translation.es: - Quizá eso lo alegrará.- No, no canto.

translation.en: Lily's coming to the library later. You could read with her.
translation.es: Vaya a leer con Lily a la biblioteca.

translation.en: Pop into the bakery. Violet's coming in to help with the Christmas cakes.
translation.es: Venga a la panadería.Violet vendrá a ayudar.

translation.en: No, I'm trying to lose calories, not gain them. We don't count calories in Cobbledon!
translation.es: - Intento perder calorías.- ¡Aquí no contamos calorías!

translation.en: Tie it up all over the house, so when they walk under it, they have to kiss,
translation.es: Cuélguenlo por toda la casa,así tendrán que besarse,

translation.en: and then, boom, magic!
I've been meaning to ask about the Christmas tree. You won't let us down!
